sections.title: Beeper Real Time
sections.text: Real-time data source that monitors Beeper's SQLite database for new messages across all connected chat networks.
list: Output: Builds a local SQLite catalog for fast search and downstream processing.

sections.title: Typical workflow
sections.intro: Configure Beeper Real Time with the connection fields and run it as part of a BrainBoost pipeline.

cards.title: Connect
cards.text: Provide database_path in the connection form.

cards.title: Fetch
cards.text: Run `fetch()` to ingest, transform, or stream data.

cards.title: Consume
cards.text: Use the emitted items in downstream indexing, search, or automation steps.

items.q: What do I need to configure?
items.a: At minimum: database_path. Additional fields may be optional depending on your use case.
Builds a local SQLite catalog for fast search and downstream processing.
Outputs are emitted to downstream subscribers in the BrainBoost pipeline. Some datasources also write artifacts (context files, catalogs, or exports) locally based on your configuration.

sections.title: Ready to use Beeper Real Time?
sections.text: Add it to your BrainBoost pipeline and start ingesting.
sections.subtext: Run this datasource locally with your own credentials and storage.
